fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render

Class AbstractLayerRenderer

  • Object
    • AbstractLayerRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayerRenderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AwtLayerRenderer, LwjglLayerRenderer, SelectionRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractLayerRenderer
extends Object
implements LayerRenderer
    A renderer to render a Layer into a LayerViewPanel.
    Author:
    Julien Perret
    See Also:
    RenderingManager, Layer, LayerViewPanel
